testsuite.name: GlobalTests

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #13
Some roads' time to close/open is incorrect. Formal snippet of expected/got output: ---Interval: 2--- ---Performed action: Started. Added 2 roads.--- ---Expected:--- Road0, open, 2s. Road1, closed, 2s. ---Got:--- Road0, open, 1s. Road1, closed, 1s.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Welcome to the traffic management system! Input the number of roads: > 2 Input the interval: > 2 Menu: 1. Add road 2. Delete road 3. Open system 0.
